trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the exception that is thrown when the channel detects that the message is a poison message.

This exception is thrown when the channel detects that Message Queuing (MSMQ) aborted processing in the message because the number of retry attempts exceeded the value specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.ReceiveRetryCount%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.MaxRetryCycles%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified lookup ID of the poison message.
The lookup ID of the poison message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified message text.
The message with which to initialize the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified lookup ID of the poison message, and the inner exception.
The lookup ID of the poison message.
The inner exception to be encapsulated by the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class with additional serialized information about the exception.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that holds the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> instance that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified message text and the inner exception.
The message with which to initialize the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
The inner exception to be encapsulated by the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.

Retrieves the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>, and the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance to hold the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> instance to hold the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
Gets the lookup ID of the poison message.
The lookup ID of the poison message.
